name: Sean Bruce
description:
I would like to describe myself as happy person,intelligent,social,clever,understanding,caring & a luving guy who respect other peoples view,am Passionate with a Great Sense of Humour, Responsible and Serious when I have to be… I Love Music,Arts,Fashion,Traveling,meeting people and all is beautiful.. I don’t drink,i don’t spoke and i live my life to the fullest.. Am a God fearing guy which believe so much in him and i think that’s the most very important things in life.. I’m a kind of man who care and love..and honest,and careing type..am not difficult to live with…love the children..and care abut them…And am not hurt temper very gentul man and enjoyable,i dont drink and i dont smoke.i dont go i out late and i dont go to a party and club….And i can cook..for my family…and careing type
Family is very important to me and I enjoy spending time with my family when I can. I am very sincere, honest, kind, trustworthy and respectful. I am a loyal friend and am always there for my family and friends when they need me.
